item.title: Singtel is encouraging subscribers to use their phones for payment at the supermarket
item.description: A picture of a Dash payment reader at a FairPrice checkout. Starting November 17th, shoppers can use Singtel’s Dash mobile payment app at over 200 NTUC FairPrice locations, including their supermarkets, Xtra hypermarkets, and standalone Cheers stores. Gan Siok Hoon, Singtel’s VP of mCommerce, Consumer Singapore, stated that as a major fintech provider, they were excited to partner with Singapore’s largest retailer, FairPrice, to offer this fast and secure payment option to their over half a million daily shoppers.

item.title: Singtel's Dash is running a flash campaign offering mystery cashback for purchases made on Lazada.SG
item.description: Source: Android Play Store. Singtel’s mobile payment app, Dash, is holding a short promotional campaign with online store Lazada.SG. From October 2nd to 9th, 2015, shoppers can receive a surprise cashback reward of 15% to 50%*. Each day of the campaign features a “Dash Happy Hour.” During this limited time frame, which lasts up to two hours, customers using Dash to pay for purchases on Lazada.SG can earn cashback. The specific cashback amount won’t be disclosed until the end of each day and will be added to customer accounts within three business days.
